DOC.brief_title: Virtual LV Lead Navigation Patients With Ischemic Cardiomyopathy
DOC.criteria: Ischemic cardiomyopathy Intrinsic QRS duration > 120 millisecond LV ejection fraction < 40 % Persistent atrial tachyarrhythmia Active cardiac ischemia Cerebrovascular accident within 6 month Surgical percutaneous cardiac revascularization procedure within 3 month Under 18 year age Pregnant Participating clinical study would preclude enrollment Unable provide inform consent
